articles.author: Sergey Goryashko
articles.title: Putin accuses Kyiv of downing Russia military plane carrying Ukraine POWs - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Russian president expressed grief only for the deaths of the pilots, not the Ukrainian prisoners, in Wednesday’s crash.
articles.content:
He claimed the Russian army detected two missile launches from Ukraine-controlled areas that hit the plane. 
“Most likely, it was American Patriot systems or European, probably French,” Putin said. … [+750 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Alex Marquardt, Becky Anderson
articles.title: Efforts to secure hostage deal and pause in Gaza fighting step up as Biden dispatches CIA chief for crucial talks in Europe - CNN
articles.description: Efforts to secure the release of hostages held in Gaza and broker a prolonged pause in fighting are arriving at an important juncture as President Joe Biden deploys a top official to Europe for multiparty talks on the contours of a possible agreement.
articles.content: Efforts to secure the release of hostages held in Gaza and broker a prolonged pause in fighting are at an important juncture as President Joe Biden deploys his point person on hostage talks to Europe… [+7096 chars]
